channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brent Options Volatility Skew Shows Market Relief After Israel's Attack
item.description: The Brent options’ volatility skew has narrowed significantly since Israel spared Iran’s oil infrastructure, highlighting a broader market view of red...

item.title: HSBC announces fresh $3 billion share buyback as third-quarter earnings beat expectations
item.description: Pre-tax profit came in at $8.5 billion, a 10% rise from the $7.7 billion posted a year ago.

item.title: Deficit Threat Drives Bond Yields Higher
item.description: Investors are betting a challenging fiscal situation might only get worse after the election.

item.title: Sterling Little Changed Ahead of U.K. Budget
item.description: Sterling was flat as investors exercised caution ahead of the U.K. budget, and the currency looks vulnerable against the dollar ahead of the U.S. elec...

item.title: Chinese Shares End Lower, Weighed by Energy, Pharma Stocks
item.description: Chinese shares ended lower, with energy stocks falling after both Cnooc and Sinopec reported lower revenues amid soft crude oil prices.

item.title: Gold Futures Rise to Near Record Levels Ahead of U.S. Elections
item.description: Gold futures edged higher in Europe, maintaining its strength despite rising Treasury yields and slightly easing geopolitical tensions, Pepperstone sa...

item.title: British oil giant BP posts weakest quarterly earnings in nearly four years on lower crude prices
item.description: British oil major BP on Tuesday reported its weakest quarterly earnings in nearly four years, weighed down by a slump in crude prices.

item.title: Dexcom shares fall on slow revenue growth
item.description: Dexcom shares fell Thursday after the company released third-quarter results that showed slow revenue growth.

item.title: McDonald's is about to report earnings. Here's what to expect
item.description: Share of McDonald's have fallen 6% since its Quarter Pounder burgers were linked to a deadly E. coli outbreak.

item.title: Ford guides to low end of 2024 earnings forecast as it slightly tops Wall Street's third-quarter expectations
item.description: Ford guides to low end of 2024 earnings forecast as it slightly tops Wall Street's Q3 expectations
